alert.note: Alert for Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:08PM PDT until October 22 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Expect gusts as high as 75 mph in highest elevations. * WHERE...Sequoia National Park including Giant Forest and Lodgepole. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra
